articles.author: Andrew Pulver
articles.title: Academy Awards apologises to Sacheen Littlefeather for Oscars speech abuse - The Guardian
articles.description: Nearly 50 years after her speech on behalf of Marlon Brando about depiction of Native Americans, academy apologises for ‘unwarranted and unjustified’ response
articles.content:
